description:
VertCoin(VC for short) is the main form of currency in Vertyco. You can acquire them in the Discord in various ways.

**HOW DO I GET VERTCOIN?**
--------------------------------
1️⃣ Use the `.payday` command every `12 hours` to get VertCoin.
Use the `.bal` command to check your balance. To view level and role info, see <#877009162586976276> 

2️⃣ Gamble with VertCoin in the <#771614032532471819> and win big to increase your balance.
3️⃣ Pet the doggo, when you see him react with 👋 and be rewarded for your kindness.
4️⃣ Invite people to the Discord and get VC referral rewards by having them type `.referredby @YourUsername`
5️⃣ Play <#773451977983918099> and compete with friends to see who can get more questions right.
6️⃣ Pull off a <#839342311568834580> with friends, get your team together and make some moolahhh.
7️⃣ Go on <#772724532585955328>'s with friends and convert the gold you find into VC.

*All items in the RCON shop are sent as Quality:10, getting ascendant every time is not guaranteed.*

To buy something, type `.dshop` for the DATA shop and `.rshop` for the RCON shop.
title: **WHAT IS VERTCOIN?**
